trans-unit.source: Contains information about the exception that is raised when an attempt is made to access an [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element corresponding to a part of the user interface that is no longer available.
trans-unit.target: 包含有关当尝试访问时引发的异常信息[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]不再可用的用户界面部分对应的元素。

trans-unit.source: This exception can be raised if the element was in a dialog box that was closed, or an application that was closed or terminated.
trans-unit.target: 如果此元素是在一个对话框，已关闭或应用程序已关闭或中止，则会引发此异常。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ElementNotAvailableException"></xref> class.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ElementNotAvailableException"></xref> class with a reference to the inner exception that caused this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ElementNotAvailableException"></xref>类对导致此异常的内部异常的引用。

trans-unit.source: The exception that caused this exception.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ElementNotAvailableException"></xref> class with a specified error message.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ElementNotAvailableException"></xref>与指定的错误消息的类。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ElementNotAvailableException"></xref> class with serialization information.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ElementNotAvailableException"></xref>用序列化信息的类。

trans-unit.source: Data needed to serialize or deserialize the object.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化或反序列化对象所需的数据。

trans-unit.source: The source and destination of the serialized stream.

Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ElementNotAvailableException"></xref> class with a specified error message and a reference to the inner exception that caused this exception.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.ElementNotAvailableException"></xref>使用指定的错误消息和对导致此异常的内部异常的引用的类。

trans-unit.source: The exception that caused this exception.
Retrieves data needed to serialize the target object.
trans-unit.target: 检索序列化目标对象所需的数据。

trans-unit.source: Data needed to serialize or deserialize the object.
trans-unit.target: 要序列化或反序列化对象所需的数据。

trans-unit.source: The destination of the serialized stream.
